TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataPagerFieldCollection extends System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection

summary.span: 代表由 所使用的 物件集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects that are used by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用類別以程式設計方式管理一組物件。You can use the class to programmatically manage a set of objects. 請注意，更常見定義這些欄位，以宣告方式而不是以程式設計的方式。Note that it is more typical to define these fields declaratively instead of programmatically. 您可以存取的屬性和方法的類別透過屬性。You can access the properties and methods of the class through the property. 您可以加入、 插入和移除物件使用的適當方法類別。You can add, insert, and remove objects by using the appropriate methods of the class. 若要以程式設計方式擷取物件集合，從執行下列其中一項：To programmatically retrieve objects from a collection, do one of following: - 使用索引子以取得單一集合中的物件。Use the indexer to get a single object from the collection. - 使用方法來建立該物件會實作，您可以用它從集合取得項目。Use the method to create an object that implements , which you can then use to get items from the collection. 屬性集合中取得的項目總數。The property gets the total number of items in the collection. 它通常用來判斷集合中的上限。It is typically used to determine the upper bound of the collection. 您可以加入項目並移除集合中的項目，使用， ， ，和方法。You can add items and remove items in the collection by using the , , , and methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是在內部呼叫在實作集合方法。The method is called internally by the collection in its implementation of the method. 方法會藉由識別所指定的型別來建立物件的執行個體`index`，並對應至所傳回的型別其中方法。The method creates an instance of an object by using the type identified by the specified `index`, which maps to one of the types returned by the method.

exception.span: 指定的索引不在辨認範圍內。

span.span: The specified index is not in the recognized range.

summary.span: 當 集合中的欄位變更時發生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由於呼叫通常就會引發事件， ， ，或方法。The event is usually raised as a result of a call to the , , , or methods. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
